data.Title: Microsoft Partners with StopNCII to Combat Revenge Porn and Deepfakes on Bing
data.Description: Microsoft is taking steps to address the spread of non-consensual intimate images, including deepfakes, on its Bing search engine. The company has partnered with StopNCII to proactively remove such harmful content using digital hashes provided by victims.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Completed: Mixed Results Reported
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update has finished rolling out after 19 days. Initial observations from SEO professionals indicate a mixed bag of results, with some websites experiencing positive ranking improvements while others saw significant drops.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT: Early User Feedback Reveals Limitations
data.Description: While OpenAI's SearchGPT prototype shows potential as a Google competitor, early user feedback highlights limitations. Users report difficulties with shopping and local queries, along with instances of inaccurate or fabricated information.

data.Title: SEO and CRO: A Winning Combination for Business Growth
data.Description: Businesses are shifting their focus from solely driving traffic to implementing holistic strategies that encompass user experience, conversion optimization (CRO), and long-term customer value. Combining SEO and CRO is crucial for sustainable growth.

data.Title: Google Search Testing New Forum Display with Top Comments
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new search results display for forum content. The updated format features top comments and related discussions, aiming to provide users with more relevant and engaging information from forum threads.
